name: minecraft-server-scanner-discord-bot
description: This is the full code for a Node.js Minecraft server scanner Discord bot I made. This bot itself doesn't do the scanning, it just pings servers in the existing database, which is actively expanded by a seperate scanning program. (The code for the server scanner can be found here: https://github.com/kgurchiek/Minecraft-Server-IP-Scanner)
author: Cornbread 2100
